TrEd Extension: arabic_treebank (version 1.19)

Penn Arabic Treebank

(generated documentation)

Description:

This package contains basic support for working with the Penn Arabic Treebank in TrEd. It consists of an input backend which converts the AG-XML+SGML input to PML and a stylesheets for visualization of the resulting PML in TrEd.

Installation

This extension can be installed directly from TrEd, using Setup >> Manage Extensions >> Get New Extensions; just make sure the repository http://ufal.mff.cuni.cz/~pajas/tred/extensions/ is enabled in Setup >> Manage Extensions >> Edit Repositories.

TrEd macro files:

  • arabic_treebank/contrib.mac

Stylesheet files:

  • /export/home/pajas/projects/tred-extensions/arabic_treebank/stylesheets/Arabic_Treebank
  • /export/home/pajas/projects/tred-extensions/arabic_treebank/stylesheets/Arabic_Treebank_alt

Resource files:

  • arabic_treebank_schema.xml
